title: Chat and Ping
body:
Good Evening, 

I am unable to chat ingame and when i try to ping my mouse goes crazy. I have recliented and checked all my settings, as well as restart my PC and still nothing seems to fix. Is anyone else having this problem and know how to fix? 

Thanks,
Syaoran

replies.body:
I'd consider doing a quick config reset first to make sure something isn't messed up in there. This is a pretty quick and easy trick, so run through these steps and let me know if it helps or not by testing it in a custom or practice game.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
I tried this and i am still witnessing the same issue.

Hmmmm alrighty. I'm not personally sure what else could be causing that, but let's get you in touch with the tech guys so they can take a closer look for ya. Reach out to them in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with some game logs for them to peruse and they should be able to figure this out!
